TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HeightMode extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Drawing.Charts.LayoutModeType

summary.para: This class is available in Office 2007 or above.
When the object is serialized out as xml, it's qualified name is c:hMode.

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlnoticeiso.md)] **hMode (Height Mode)** This element specifies how to interpret the Height element for this manual layout. |Parent Elements| |---------------------| |manualLayout (§21.2.2.104)| |Attributes|Description| |----------------|-----------------| |val (Layout Mode Value)|Specifies the layout mode for the width.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the *ST_LayoutMode* simple type (§21.2.3.20).| [*Note*: The W3C XML Schema definition of this element’s content model (CT_LayoutMode) is located in §A.5.1. *end note*] [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlcopyrightiso.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the HeightMode class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class DocumentFormat.OpenXml.OpenXmlElement CloneNode(bool deep) cil managed
Public Overrides Function CloneNode (deep As Boolean) As OpenXmlElement

Docs.param: true to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node; false to clone only the node itself.
Docs.summary: Creates a duplicate of this node.
